title: Hello Beautiful Life
overview: The story of the Sun sisters with different personalities and walk on different life trajectories. One who dares to fight and is freeminded, the other is warm and sweet. Sun Xin is beautiful and generous, pursuing freedom and daring to fight. Elder sister has a flourishing life in an Internet company, and her life is moving forward to a future full of promise. Sun Xiang is innocent and kind, loves to talk and laugh. The younger sister explores her own strengths and works as a food blogger, and her life is plain but tasteful. Life is full of flavors, and happiness, eventhough struggle are the first flavors. The diligent and kind Sun sisters tirelessly work for their dreams. They are part of the society that is full of vitality and prosperity.
